Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Rey Carlos in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Maspalomas), you'll be convenient to Yumbo Shopping Center and Kasbah Shopping Center. This hotel is within close proximity of Holiday World Maspalomas and CITA Shopping Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 160 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax and unwind with massages and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool and a spa tub. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), a hair salon, and shopping on site.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Rey Carlos. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and a library. Planning an event in San Bartolome de Tirajana? This hotel has facilities measuring 592 square feet (55 square meters), including a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Rey Carlos. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

With a stay at Hotel Rey Carlos in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Maspalomas), you'll be convenient to Yumbo Shopping Center and Kasbah Shopping Center. This hotel is within close proximity of Holiday World Maspalomas and CITA Shopping Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Yumbo Shopping Center - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Kasbah Shopping Center - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Holiday World Maspalomas - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
CITA Shopping Center - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Maspalomas Golf Course - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Las Burras Beach - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Playa de San Agustin - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Maspalomas Beach - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Maspalomas Dunes - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Aqualand Maspalomas - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Maspalomas Lighthouse - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Meloneras Beach - 4 km / 2.5 mi
El Aguila Beach - 5.1 km / 3.1 mi
Palmitos Park - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi
Puerto Rico Shopping Center - 13 km / 8.1 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Rey Carlos is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 26.5 km / 16.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
